Comments_List: Ideas of mathematical systems and computability theories. That gives me a very different view of the math and computer science I learned before.

Strengths: The course provides everyone a chance to present in class and everyone has high participation. The oral exam is a perfect method of encouraging us to learn by ourselves and Professor Shin will guarantee that we have learned thoroughly by pointing out our mistakes during the exam. The final assignment is challenging but helpful to understand the whole of we learned for the semester.
Weakness: None

Yes. This is one of the best courses I've ever taken. The course settings can help everyone keep following the class. And it brings you challenges and much more different views of everything about math.
